name: Bounce The Ball
description:
Bounce The Ball is a casual but challenging infinite bouncer.

  • The further you travel, the higher your score.
  • Hit the angled platforms with enough force to rebound high into sky.
  • Bounce on the white platforms to gain an extra bonus jump that can be used in mid air to give your ball a boost in altitude.
  • The further you travel, the greater the variety of platform shapes and their behaviours (i.e. some move, some don't).
  • Fall into the clouds below and it is game over.
  • Survive as long as you can and try to beat your previous high score. 
  • Includes customisable key bindings and full controller support.
